dev/lsf/util/locale.hpp

00001 // File:        locale.hpp
00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      leoxiang <leoxiang727@qq.com>
00005 // Revision:    2015-08-13 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 #include <iconv.h>
00009 #include "lsf/basic/error.hpp"
00010 
00011 namespace lsf {
00012 namespace util {
00013 
00015 // Locale
00016 class Locale : lsf::basic::Error {
00017 public:
00018     static bool ConvertGbkToUtf8(std::string& output) {
00019         return ConvertCode("GB2312", "UTF-8", output);
00020     }
00021 
00022     static bool ConvertGbkToUtf8(std::string const& input, std::string& output) {
00023         return ConvertCode("GB2312", "UTF-8", input, output);
00024     }
00025 
00026     static bool ConvertUtf8ToGbk(std::string const& input, std::string& output) {
00027         return ConvertCode("UTF-8", "GB2312", input, output);
00028     }
00029 
00030 private:
00031     static bool ConvertCode(char const* from_charset, char const* to_charset, std::string& output) {
00032         return ConvertCode(from_charset, to_charset, output.data(), output.size(), output);
00033     }
00034 
00035     static bool ConvertCode(char const* from_charset, char const* to_charset, std::string const& input, std::string& output) {
00036         return ConvertCode(from_charset, to_charset, input.data(), input.size(), output);
00037     }
00038 
00039     static bool ConvertCode(char const* from_charset, char const* to_charset, char const* inbuf, size_t inlen, std::string& output) {
00040         // init buffer
00041         size_t outlen = inlen*4;
00042         char* outbuf = new char[outlen];
00043 
00044         // do convert
00045         size_t new_outlen = outlen;
00046         size_t new_inlen = inlen;
00047         bool ret = ConvertCode(from_charset, to_charset, (char*)inbuf, &new_inlen, outbuf, &new_outlen);
00048         if (ret) output.assign(outbuf, outlen - new_outlen);
00049 
00050         // release buffer
00051         delete[] outbuf;
00052         return ret;
00053     }
00054 
00055     static bool ConvertCode(char const* from_charset, char const* to_charset, void* inbuf, size_t* pinlen, void* outbuf, size_t* poutlen) {
00056         // get convert descriptor
00057         iconv_t conv_desc = iconv_open(to_charset, from_charset);
00058         if (conv_desc == iconv_t(-1)) return false;
00059 
00060         // do convert
00061         char** pinbuf  = (char**)&inbuf;
00062         char** poutbuf = (char**)&outbuf;
00063         if (iconv(conv_desc, pinbuf, pinlen , poutbuf, poutlen) == size_t(-1)) {
00064             iconv_close(conv_desc);
00065             return false;
00066         }
00067 
00068         // clear up
00069         iconv_close(conv_desc);
00070         return true;
00071     }
00072 };
00073 
00074 } // end namespace util
00075 } // end namespace lsf
00076
